pullrequest.title: Added npm-shrinkwrap to lock versions of upstream node packages

content.raw:
First of all thanks for the PR @jliviero !

I do understand the problem the ```node-gyp``` is causing you, and I agree it would be useful adding an ```npm-shrinkwrap``` .
 
So, which combination of ```gzweb``` version and ```node``` are you using ?

I've generated an ```npm-shrinkwrap``` from default but was a little different from yours.
content.html:
First of all thanks for the PR @jliviero !

I do understand the problem the node-gyp is causing you, and I agree it would be useful adding an npm-shrinkwrap .

So, which combination of gzweb version and node are you using ?

I've generated an npm-shrinkwrap from default but was a little different from yours.
